de.polygonal.ds.ListSet<T>

type
class
implements
Set<T>

A simple set using an array.

Worst-case running time in Big O notation

Constructor

new()

Instance Variables

key : Int

A unique identifier for this object.
A hash table transforms this key into an index of an array element by using a hash function.
This value should never be changed by the user.

reuseIterator : Bool

If true, reuses the iterator object instead of allocating a new one when calling iterator().
The default is false.
If true, nested iterations are likely to fail as only one iteration is allowed at a time.

Instance Methods

clear(?purge : Bool) : Void

parameters
purge if true, nullifies references upon removal.
Removes all elements. 1 or n if purge is true

clone(?assign : Bool, ?copier : T -> T) : Collection<T>

parameters
assign if true, the copier parameter is ignored and primitive elements are copied by value whereas objects are copied by reference.
If false, the clone() method is called on each element. In this case all elements have to implement Cloneable.
copier a custom function for copying elements. Replaces element.clone() if assign is false.
throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError element is not of type Cloneable (debug only).
Duplicates this set. Supports shallow (structure only) and deep copies (structure & elements).

contains(x : T) : Bool

Same as has(). n

free() : Void

Destroys this object by explicitly nullifying all elements.
Improves GC efficiency/performance (optional). n

has(x : T) : Bool

Returns true if this set contains the element x. n

isEmpty() : Bool

Returns true if this set is empty. 1

iterator() : Itr<T>

see
http://haxe.org/ref/iterators
Iterates over all elements contained in this set.
The elements are visited in a random order.

merge(x : Set<T>, assign : Bool, ?copier : T -> T) : Void

parameters
assign if true, the copier parameter is ignored and primitive elements are copied by value whereas objects are copied by reference.
If false, the clone() method is called on each element. In this case all elements have to implement Cloneable.
copier a custom function for copying elements. Replaces element.clone() if assign is false.
throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError element is not of type Cloneable (debug only).
Adds all elements of the set x to this set. n

remove(x : T) : Bool

returns
true if x was successfully removed.
Removes the element x. n

set(x : T) : Bool

returns
true if x was added to this set, false if x already exists.
Adds the element x to this set if possible. n

size() : Int

The total number of elements. 1

toArray() : Array<T>

Returns an unordered array containing all elements in this set.

toDA() : DA<T>

Returns an unordered dense array containing all elements in this set.

toString() : String

Returns a string representing the current object.
Example:
	  var set = new de.polygonal.ds.ListSet<String>();
	  set.set("val1");
	  set.set("val2");
	  trace(set);
	  {ListSet, size: 2}
	  |<
	    val1
	    val2
	  >|

toVector() : flash.Vector<Dynamic>

Returns a Vector.<T> object containing all elements in this set.
